FuncDef:
The set sfu isolate-switch enable command enables SFU isolation.
The undo set sfu isolate-switch enable command disables SFU isolation.
By default, SFU isolation is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent pass loss and improve network quality when an SFU is swapped online, run the set sfu isolate-switch enable command to enable SFU isolation.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
